snippet: In a rift that could threaten Israel’s unity government, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his coalition partner, Shaul Mofaz, disagree on what to do about ultra-Orthodox men who avoid service.
abstract: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel disbands the committee he had charged with devising a plan for universal military or national service, a move that could lead to a coalition crisis and end the national unity government; the broad coalition is in turmoil over the issue of how to draft more ultra-Orthodox Jews as well as Arab citizens.
lead_paragraph: In a rift that could threaten Israel’s unity government, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his coalition partner, Shaul Mofaz, disagree on what to do about ultra-Orthodox men who avoid service.

headline.seo: Israel Disbands Panel Working on Military Service Rules
headline.main: Israel Disbands Panel on Military Service Rules
headline.print_headline: Israel Disbands Panel Working on New Rules for Military Service
